tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Attempts.description: The number of attempts to make per page or block when uploading. Defaults to `1`.

Name.description: The name of the storage blob. Must be unique within the storage container the blob is located.

Parallelism.description: The number of workers per CPU core to run for concurrent uploads. Defaults to `8`.

ResourceGroupName.description:
The name of the resource group in which to
create the storage container. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Size.description: Used only for `page` blobs to specify the size in bytes of the blob to be created. Must be a multiple of 512. Defaults to 0.

Source.description: An absolute path to a file on the local system. Cannot be defined if `source_uri` is defined.

SourceUri.description:
The URI of an existing blob, or a file in the Azure File service, to use as the source contents
for the blob to be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Cannot be defined if `source` is defined.

StorageAccountName.description:
Specifies the storage account in which to create the storage container.
Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

StorageContainerName.description: The name of the storage container in which this blob should be created.

Type.description:
The type of the storage blob to be created. One of either `block` or `page`. When not copying from an existing blob,
this becomes required.
